name: AMiner
tagline: 2D Arcade-like Mining Game made in Enigma on Ubuntu
body:
### Welcome to AMiner!
  This is the website for an in-development, 2d mining-like arcade game being built using Enigma game development software on the Ubuntu operating system. 

### Goals
  Develop a quick-arcade style mining game with enough depth to keep players interested but simple enough to get released within a year of  development.

### Developer Contact
Professional inquiries only please; michaelscottstuart at yahoo dot com
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
